attributes.action: A Brexit campaigner for next prime minister, and to negotiate deals with the EU.
attributes.background: We need a Brexit or leave supporter as our next prime minister, and to negotiate deals with the EU.  We feel that anyone who was passionate about us staying in the EU will be feeling guilty we left giving in to bad EU offers for the UK.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament, and party leadership elections are internal party matters.
